attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How come in a country the size of ours we have over 500 MP,s?when the USA has substantially lower representatives,this government "prides" itself on Modernisation so its time for MPs ,and the archaic procedures in the elected chambers to be brought into the 21st century,

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
